data.system_settings: Windows 10 (x64) Build 15063.293 @ Version 1703, Discord Canary Version 0.0.157
data.actual_result: Window stays and does not close
data.expected_result: You can close the window/it responds to the kick/ban
data.short_description: Unpin / pin window does not close upon server removal.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the unpin or pin message dialog in a server - Be kicked/banned from the server
